programme.title: Australia
Australia
programme.desc: Directed by Baz Luhrmann. With Nicole Kidman, Hugh Jackman, Shea Adams, Eddie Baroo. Set in northern Australia before World War II, an English aristocrat who inherits a sprawling ranch reluctantly pacts with a stock-man in order to protect her new property from a takeover plot. programme.desc: Directed by Michel Leclerc. With Leïla Bekhti, Edouard Baer, Ramzy Bedia, Tom Lévy. As everyone knows, children make no difference between social classes, skin colors or religions. programme.desc: Directed by Rose Bosch. With Jean Reno, Anna Galiena, Chloé Jouannet, Hugo Dessioux. Lea, Adrian, and their little brother Theo, born deaf, go on holiday in Provence with their grandfather, Paul "Oliveron" they never met because of a family quarrel. Unfortunately, it is not the holidays they dreamed, especially after their father announced that he was leaving the house. In less than 24 hours, it is the clash of generations between the teens and their grandfather.

programme.desc: Directed by Roman Prygunov. With Vladimir Mashkov, Aleksandra Bortich, Gela Meskhi, Pavel Chinaryov. programme.title: Le repos des braves
programme.desc: Sur la Grande route des Alpes, Guillaume Brac suit un groupe de valeureux cyclistes, en lutte contre le froid et la fatigue. L'étape finie, voici venu le moment pour ces retraités avides de liberté de se demander ce qu'ils vont bien pouvoir faire une fois rentrés chez eux. Comment déjouer la solitude et l'ennui ? À travers leurs confessions, c'est tout notre rapport au monde du travail qui transparaît.

Le fantôme de Canterville
programme.desc: Directed by Yann Samuell. With Audrey Fleurot, Michaël Youn, Michèle Laroque, Lionnel Astier. In the depths of a British legend, the ghost of Eleanor Canterville is condemned to haunt the castle of his family and to scare away any inhabitant. But when Otis, a family fleeing Parisian life, buy the castle, Eleanor is upset because she cannot scare this tribe of the twenty-first century. Worse yet, children ridicule ...

programme.title: Mes meilleurs copains
Mes meilleurs copains
programme.desc: Directed by Jean-Marie Poiré. With Gérard Lanvin, Christian Clavier, Jean-Pierre Bacri, Philippe Khorsand. They are the best friends of the world. Five friends who shared everything: may 68, hippies years, the rock and their love for Bernadette. This Bernadette has left them to become a rock-star, and is back 15 years later for a weekend. Jean-Marie Poire describes with this movie the portrait of a generation with lots of humor served by excelent actors.
